channel.title: Blogs on Ryder Davis
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Ryder Davis

item.title: First Post
item.description: Hello! Welcome to my first blog post! In this post I’m going to talk a little bit about regular expressions. With regular expressions, you can find certain pieces within a chunk of code. To make it easier, a cheat sheet will be below. By using these special symbols, you can decide what you want to pick out. We’re going to find all occurences, so we’ll need to import re, then use the template re.
